summary: Sarah Johnson scheduled a Q4 sprint planning meeting for Thursday at 2pm to discuss the new authentication module and API refactor, requesting team review of the architecture doc.
questions: When is the Q4 sprint planning meeting?
What will be discussed in the sprint planning session?
What is the new authentication module?
Where can I find the architecture doc for review?
title: Sprint Planning for Q4
text: Let's sync up on Thursday at 2pm for Q4 sprint planning. We need to discuss the new authentication module and the API refactor. Please review the architecture doc before the meeting: https://docs.techcorp.com/q4-plan
claims: Sprint planning meeting scheduled for Thursday
Discussion topics: authentication module, API refactor

messages.speaker: sarah.johnson@techcorp.com
messages.text: Hey team, Let's sync up on Thursday at 2pm for Q4 sprint planning. We need to discuss the new authentication module and the API refactor. Please review the architecture doc before the meeting: https://docs.techcorp.com/q4-plan. Thanks, Sarah
